text: San'nan kuma zukãtanku, suka ƙẽƙashe daga bãyan wancan. Sabõda haka suka zamanto kamar duwatsu. Ko mafi tsananin ƙeƙashewa. kuma lalle ne daga duwãtsu, haƙĩka, akwai abin da maremari suke ɓuɓɓuga daga gare shi, kuma lalle ne daga gare su, haƙĩƙa, akwai abin da yake tsatstsagewa har ruwa ya fita daga gare shi, kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, daga gare su, haƙĩƙa, akwai da yake fãɗõwa dõmin tsõron Allah, kuma Allah bai zama gãfili ba daga barin abin da kuke aikatãwa
